moves.3... d6 4. h3 Nc6 5. Bb5 Be7 6. d4 exd4: I should find something else than that. Now, it is no more that safe to double pawns on c or f-line...
moves.9. Ba6 O-O 10. O-O Rb8 11. a3 Rb6 12. Qe: I have the impression, looking back, that both we were playing for the draw...
moves.25. Qd2 Bf6 26. c3 Qb5 27. Rd1 Qb3: actually, i was playing to win, but i lacked of imagination...
moves.31. Bg3 Be5 32. Bxe5 Qxe5 33. Kf2 Re7 34: i have hesitated to go to g3, but there is nothing really...
moves.38. Qd2 Qc4+ 39. Qd3 Qxd3+: and that's all folks: no apparent mistake... I wish someone could tell us where we could have gone further...
